#!/bin/bash
# Singleplayer Tarkov Server Installation Script w/ Fika mod
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
# Credits to Chyeetos in the Fika Discord for the Docker version of this script

# Working directory for build requirements
cd ${HOME}

# Install git-lfs
apt update && apt install -yq git-lfs

# Install NodeJS
git clone https://github.com/nvm-sh/nvm.git $HOME/.nvm
chmod o+rwx -R $HOME/.nvm
source $HOME/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm install ${NODE_VERSION}

# Clone the SPT AKI repo
git clone --branch ${SPT_BRANCH} https://dev.sp-tarkov.com/SPT-AKI/Server.git server
cd ${HOME}/server && git checkout HEAD^

# Obtaining server files
cd ${HOME}/server/project/
git-lfs fetch --all && git-lfs pull

# Install npm dependencies and build
source $HOME/.nvm/nvm.sh && npm install && npm run build:release -- --arch=$([ "$(uname -m)" = "aarch64" ] && echo arm64 || echo x64) --platform=linux
mv ${HOME}/server/project/build/* /mnt/server/
rm -rf ${HOME}/server

# Obtain Project Fika & build it
cd /mnt
git clone --branch ${FIKA_BRANCH} https://github.com/project-fika/Fika-Server.git ./server/user/mods/fika-server
source $HOME/.nvm/nvm.sh && cd ./server/user/mods/fika-server && git checkout HEAD^ && npm install
rm -rf /mnt/server/user/mods/FIKA/.git
